text: KidsI honestly see no reason to exist except that I love my kids   They re   and    I honestly think I ll give up once I know they ve gotten careers and can live independently   There s no way I d be around this long if I hadn t had them   Funny  I never wanted kids and found such a purpose after I had them   I have a very decent career  but I m lonely and don t have any friends  My relationship is horrible and I m only sticking around until my younger son graduates from high school  I don t know and can t imagine what it feels like if I hadn t had kids and lived this long   I wish I had someone to talk with who understood  but the only person I could committed suicide a few years ago  At this point I just want to figure out how to feel ok for another   years bc I feel like I have to   After that  whatever
summary: I love my kids. I have a decent career but I'm lonely and I don't have any friends. My relationship is horrible. I want to live until my younger son graduates from high school. I can't imagine what it would feel like if I hadn't had kids.
